description: bazzite and win4 6800u, runs my copy of smt V quite well. has mods for extra functionality that wasnt native to the switch port. overall pleased.

Works as intendet.
Cant add games. Confirmed known "flapjak problem"
Dialogs for simple things like "Open Ryujinx folder" or "Open Logs Folder" don't work. More importantly, the dialog for installing the firmware from a zip won't open
App works perfect on steam deck, both flatpak and direct download.Xenoblade runs wel.I hope to see CPU optimizations as its very demanding for the deck as temps hit 90C due to heavy load.
nintendo of america shot up my neghbrohood after installing this :(((

trouble even running the emulator at all due to some 'keys' required??
just.. nope. there's far easier ways to play or emulate switch than this.

and their site only covers windows. sooooo.

You need to download Switch firmware to run this emulator (and "legally" get the games from somewhere).

To get firmware the easy way: search for RyuSAK, it's FOSS where you can download it. It's as easy to just download the firmware by searching "emulator files" (site emulation.gametechwiki) and download it manually and updating firmware from Ryujinx.

Have fun!
summary: Amazing emulator. Check my review if you have problems with this

I've gotten my games to run smoothly, and using flatpak, expanded the permissions to copy yuzu's. Otherwise it doesn't read the sd.

Love it so far and great job with the updates, guys!
crashes on steam deck after update

have found that ive been able to run the high intensity games such as a pocket monster game ;) with better graphic and smoother than the alternative emulator. Only negative is UI can be buggy and have tofind the directories to add files manually due to the ui menu not showing folder links when clicking on them
Runs better than other known emulators, but has a little issue. Every time the mouse hides, screen goes black in fullscreen until i move the cursor.
homie has no clue XD "flapjack"LMAO tysm ryu
Not sure why some people dislike this emulator. It runs totk decently, although the fps could be better. I think I'll try botw next.

Whenever players or myself setup the controller for ryujinx for steam deck it doesn't work. I updated it to latest version they still haven't fix the issue. I tried downgrading to another version it still doesn't work. When will Ryujinx team fix the controller mapping because I am sure others expressed themselves on the internet about these issues but now a days people are being censored, peoples websites are being taken down by expressing thst the controller mapping not responding and not working. i would really want to play my games with a controller. Games work but controller doesn't work. This is not a wifi issue itts a Ryujinx software issue in there program that needs to be fixed ASAP as this nintendo switch app requires a controller to play.
No matter how much internet searching I've done all the games I want to play look and perform better on Ryujinx than Yuzu. I don't know why. You tell me.

Nice and easy! Keep up with the great work.
runs great but many buttons are broken like manage dlc, open save data, open ryujinx floder,open mods location etc.

Ryujinx is a fantastic Switch emulator, runs most games flawlessly & has much less glitches than the competition. You do need to have a decent gaming PC for the best experience (preferably AMD graphics), but once set up it is ridiculously good. I always forget I'm even using an emulator when I start gaming
Keep up the great work!!
Works well. It's Ryujinx on Linux, not much more to say.

a good emulator, but it has a major issue.
u cant select folders/files on archlinux kde or steamos3(holoiso).
the button simply does nothing. that is a missing dependency issue.
i got it working few weeks ago on holoiso by installing 3 packages from archlinux repo, but i cant remember their exact names anymore.
something with desktop in the name :(

Nachdem man die Keys eingefügt, die Firmware installiert hat (Aktuelle Version 16.0.1) läuft es super. Einfach den Bibliotheks-Ordner angeben, Updates der einzelnen Spiele können eingefügt werden und zu guter letzt auch DLC's aus dem Store. Haben am Wochenende zum Beispiel Spaßeshalber zu dritt Mario Kart 8 getestet, selbst der Muliplayer macht keine Probleme. Wenn man einen ROM das erste mal spielt kann es vereinselnt zu FPS-Drops kommen, doch das legt sich. Controller-Unterstützung find ich Bombe, aktuell spiele ich mit dem Dualsense, habe dann noch Switch Controller getestet und den Dualshock. Bei einem Controller musste ich die Deadzone des linken Stickes anpassen, da der "bissl" (xD) ausgeleiert ist, doch selbst das funktioniert tadellos! Weiter so! *thumb up*
Es muy bueno y rapido pero en flathub tarda mucho en estar al dia.
summary: Tarda mucho en estar al dia
